name: Wrong Way Racing Car, Crazy Car
name_original: Wrong Way Racing Car, Crazy Car
description:
The newest Wrong Way Racing Car takes you out to be on A FIELD TRIP!

Brand-new scenes your driving experience rewarding!

Tap screen to avoid other cars and the walls. Varied cars provide unique challenges. Don't let the other cars get in the way of your vacation!

Features:
- Simple and enjoyable gameplay
- Global leaderboards with Apple Game Center
- Post high-score to Facebook and brag to your friends

How to Play:
- Tap screen to change lane!
- Avoid crashing for as long as possible

Easy to play, how far you can drive?
